comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] I never have any luck linking to SLQ pics...the links drop out after a short period of time...the SLQ turns into a pumpkin after 4.30pm ... nla.gov.au/nla.news-article21754606 ...the CG Guest House is briefly mentioned in this 1931 Brisbane Courier item on the 'Glamorous Twin Border Resorts' A prize (? a pumpkin) should be awarded to the first Flickrite who manages to identify someone in this crowd! Just going on the cardigans and coats, it must have been what counts for Winter in these parts...no one has any sand on their shoes...not a pair of board shorts in sight!

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Infuriating!  What a happy looking bunch!

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Whoops! Just changed the link to the good ol' Trove record. That should do it! They don't look ready for a surf do they? ;)
